title: Anthony Yarde's father dies with coronavirus
description: Britain's Anthony Yarde urges people to stay at home after his father dies with the coronavirus.
content:
Anthony Yarde has won all 19 of his professional bouts, including 18 by knockout
Britain's Anthony Yarde has urged people to stay at home after his father died with the coronavirus.
